chapter.title: Inversion Of Control
chapter.para: The services are not responsible for the instantiation of the components on which they depend.
This architecture provides a loosely coupled design where the implementation of dependant services can be transparently exchanged.

section.para: Don't let the object create itself the instances of the object that it references. This job is delegated to the container (assembler in the picture).
